Title: Requires animal shelters to annually report on intake and disposition of animals and the number of animals turned away by such shelters
Summary: Requires animal shelters to annually report on intake and disposition of animals and the number of animals turned away by such shelters; requires shelters to submit such reports to the department of agriculture and markets, and requires such department to post the reports on their website.
LawCode: Add ยง374-a, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to requiring animal shelters to prepare annual reports
